description:
These creatures will join you on Dream’s Doorstep, where you can befriend them through unique quests and minigames; from snowflake design, to tuning crystal harps, to telling ghost stories! 

Features: 

• 50+ characters, each with unique personalities, dialogue, quests, and collectable poses.
• Photography gameplay, with photo scores unlocking new levels.
• Full free roaming movement, in addition to an on-rails experience.
• Distinct quests and minigames centered around photography, music, art, and dialogue.
• A variety of puzzles, solved with tools like donut treats, movable magnets and throwable fireflies.

Values:

• No time wasted. No fetch quests or grinding! Each quest reward is a either a new game mechanic or piece of content!
• Creative and non-violent. Alekon focuses on the creative arts, instead of slaughtering boars.
• Old soul, modern polish. Inspired by the magical adventures in games of old, Alekon recreates nostalgic memories while adhering to modern standards of polish and user experience.
name: Alekon
